Name: Love Duction! The Guide for Galactic Lovers
About the game: 'What you need for love are: Your stamp, a Guide, and a little bit of spirit.' Story Despite being traumatized by love, life for Nanaboshi Kanata was mostly normal. That normalcy suddenly gets flipped on its head when he comes in to contact with the Guide for Galactic Lovers . 'My name is Serie. I am here to support your love life.' With her words, things really start accelerating beyond his control. He finds out that his classmate, Yamada is actually an alien and then finds that the weather report is correct about it being sunny with a chance of spaceships. On top of all that, he finds himself in the awkward position of having to choose to fall in love with two girls who are vying for the Galactic Presidency...? '...Calculation for both routes complete. Probability of success is infinitely large——' Serie's guiding words tell Kanata that he is capable of making the impossible possible. And thus Kanata and the two girls begin the 4th Loveduction. Features Features the character designs of Kaniya Shiku Scenario by Ejimura, Uoda Suu, Omutsu Opening theme by Hal2Band Multiple Endings Japanese voice acting (except for main character) English and Japanese language options
